overview: Project 1 _ Hong Hyung-sook  The children who are enthusiastically painting and cutting a doll. What stories will be told at the Square?  -  Project 10 _ Kim Jeong-geun  The janitorial worker from the Busan Subway Station, Kim Young-ja talks about how she hopes to see a clean world, just like how she cleans everywhere in the subway.
title: Candle in the Wave
